metadata.title: CVE-2024-42133 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: Ignore too large handle values in BIGhci_le_big_sync_established_evt is necessary to filter out cases where thehandle value is belonging to ida id range, otherwise ida will beerroneouslyreleased in hci_conn_cleanup.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
